#!/usr/bin/env python3

import re

cons = 'QWRTYPSDFGHJKLZXCVBNMqwrtypsdfghjklzxcvbnm'
vowels = 'AEIOUaeiou'

def __starting_point():
    string = input().strip()
    
    m = re.findall(r"(?<=[%s])([%s]{2,})[%s]" % (cons, vowels, cons), string)
    
    print(("\n".join(m or ['-1'])))
    

__starting_point()
